synopsis.text:
God, fearing the boundless potential of humans, once split the world into two realms: Elde, a realm governed by science, and Fandavale, a realm brimming with magic. Souta, an ordinary boy living in Elde, is thrust into an extraordinary journey when he discovers that he is the Key of Elde, a powerful entity capable of merging the two worlds.

In Fandavale, the malevolent witch Cendrillon yearns for dominance over both realms and seeks the Key to fulfill her nefarious ambitions. To protect Souta from Cendrillon and her minions, the Nightmarelians, a group of Fairy Musketeers, led by Akazukin (Red Riding Hood) and her eloquent wolf companion, Val, embark on a mission to safeguard the Key.

As Souta navigates through the enchanting world of Fandavale, he encounters captivating characters like Shirayukihime (Snow White), Ibarahime (Sleeping Beauty), and even the cunning duo Hansel and Gretel. Join Souta in this whimsical adventure as he uncovers the truth behind his mother's fairy tale and embraces his destiny as the Key of Elde.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
